job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: About NetAppÂ NetAppÂ is a Fortune 500 company that believes in the transformative power of data â to expand customer touchpoints, to foster greater innovation, and to optimize operations. And we do it with industry-leading solutions that work across diverse environments and the worldâs biggest hyper-scale cloud providers.Â Â At NetApp, we fully embrace and advance a diverse, inclusive workforce with a culture of belonging that enables our employees to bring their whole selves to do their lifeâs best work.Â Â Who do we look for?â¯Â Are you a continuous learner who wants to join an empowered team of forward-thinking, smart, dedicated technologists that approaches every problem with fresh eyes? If you answered yes, you may be who NetApp is looking for!Â We recognize that not everyone fits neatly into any checklist, but below are some of the skills and experience we think will help make you successful in this role. If you donât match everything on thisâ¯list, butâ¯are excited about the opportunity and think you could contribute, weâd love to hear from you.Â Â Job DescriptionÂ Participate in product design, development, verification, troubleshooting, and delivery of a system or major subsystemsÂ Collaborate with team members on designing and implementing software with a focus on simplicity, reliability, and manageability using C++Â Write unit and automated integration testsÂ Participate in technical discussions within the team and with other groups within the Business UnitÂ Receive guidance and mentoring on assigned tasks from senior engineers, managers, and technical teamÂ Participate in virtual and cloud environmentsÂ ContributeÂ inÂ the area of certificates, encryption, key management or other security related areas.Â Job RequirementsÂ Experience with multiple programming languages is a plusÂ Proficiency in C, C++, and/or PythonÂ Experience with Linux/FreeBSD development.Â Understanding of multi-threaded & multi process environmentsÂ Familiarity with TCP/IP protocols and networking applications developmentÂ Possessâ¯exceptionalâ¯written and verbal communication skillsÂ Strong aptitude for learning new technologiesÂ Ability to work on a diverse teamÂ Education and ExperienceÂ Less than 3â¯years of software development experienceÂ A Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science or equivalentÂ (December 2021 graduates encouraged to apply)Passion for writing and testing high quality codeÂ Broad knowledge of computer science fundamentalsÂ Projects, professional experience, or coursework related to operating systems, computer architecture, multi-threading, data structures &â¯algorithmsÂ Â âAt NetApp, we fully embrace and advance a diverse, inclusive global workforce with a culture of belonging that leverages the backgrounds and perspectives of all employees, customers, partners, and communities to foster a higher performing organization.â â George Kurian, CEOÂ Â
